boardgame.name: Mare Nostrum
Цивилизация
boardgame.description: In the Ancient World, civilizations are built upon 3 foundations: Commerce, Construction, and Expansion. As a leader of an ancient Mediterranean Power, each player will need to master all 3 roads to power in order to lead their civilization to dominance and victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mare Nostrum is all about the expansion of one's lands, the construction of new cities, and the dispatching of caravans to take advantage of rare commodities that can either be traded or exploited to build constructions and eventually wonders of the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But diplomacy and trade are but one path to greatness. The expansion of your navy and armies can take what should be rightfully yours. Hiring great leaders will further expand your boundaries in quick time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Controlling a combined total of 4 Wonders and/or Leaders or being the first to build the Pyramids will assure victory. But there are many hurdles to overcome to achieve such heights._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mare Nostrum allows for up to 5 players and offers a basic and advanced game in which players can customise their starting civilisation. For a game of such scope, it is quite amazing to think that the game only requires 2 pages of rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mare Nostrum is a winner of the 2001 Concours International de Créateurs de Jeux de Société._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2003 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

Mare Nostrum - Brand NEW, factory SEALED This outstanding empire-building game from Eurogames is one of the best new games on the market. Compete with your opponents to establish political, economic, and military dominance in the Mediterranean region. Add Mare Nostrum to your own collection, also makes a great gift! Buy it now for $44.00 USD plus $12.00 S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H (UPS, insured) within continental US. Will ship when payment clears. Contact me for shipping rates to other countries. I specialize in out-of-print and hard-to-find games. Be sure to check out all my other games available through the BoardGameGeek Marketplace!

Complete, played once. Condition: Box: Slight creasing on the upper left hand corner of the lid. Components: Excellent, with one exception (see below...). The rest of the story: We played it once, and it just didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t work for us. However, during that playing, our 1-year-old somehow grabbed the Player Aid sheet for Carthage....and then crumpled it. I was (1) horrified, and (2) wondering how I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d ever get it back without her ripping it. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure what we used to bribe her, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s still in one piece. So, the Carthage Player Aid sheet has a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Genuine Parchment Style Look_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to it. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s perfectly legible, but obviously crumpled. The other way to look at it is that you, as the Carthaginian, can smugly sit back and display your Genuine Parchment Player Aid while the rest of the poor fools try to read the text on their modern, glossy, no-ancient-atmosphere Player Aids. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d probably even expect to pay extra for the privilege, but, while supplies last, I have a deal for you.... :-) Shipping cost will be the cost for a 4.5 lb package from 48104 to your zip code via either USPS Priority/Parcel or FedEx Ground.

Like new, played once by me. All components present. Includes some additional player aids -- turn sequence summaries, resource tracking pads. Buyer pays all shipping costs (and insurance costs, if desired). Will ship worldwide.

Mare Nostrum German Edition / Deutsche Version (Eurogames), 1,7 Kg Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten.
